Freezing or Unfreezing Labels

When a label is frozen, the label cannot be:

  • Attached to any additional folders or items.

  • Detached from any folder or items.

  • Moved from one revision of a folder or item to another.

You can identify a frozen label by an icon with a small snowflake displaying in its upper right corner. The icon displays in front of the label name in the list box.

To freeze or unfreeze a label:

  1. On the View or context menu, click Labels. This action displays the Labels dialog.

  2. If the label to be frozen is a view label, select the View tab. If the label to be frozen is a revision label, select the Revision tab. These tabs list existing labels in reverse chronological order, based on the time that they were created.

  3. Select the label from the list box.

  4. Click Freeze or Unfreeze. The Freeze/Unfreeze button changes its name depending on the current status of the selected label. For example, if the label is currently frozen, the button reads Unfreeze.
